type.description: A label for the generator API. Currently unused

language.description: A hint to the adaptor to tweak language-specific features of the model (casing etc). Currently unused.

apache.description: Whether to include the Apache-2.0 license instead of the Unlicense

directories.description: list of directories to create in output directory

defaults.description: Any settings/overrides to be passed to the adaptor. Required even if empty

partials.description: A map containing the partial name as key and the template filename as value

items.description: Must contain output, one of template or input is also required
